data.aiOpinion: {"Problem_Found":"Changing the hostname to 'automation' might create confusion in network management and monitoring tools that rely on the hostname for identification.","Category":"Network Management","Outage_Potentials":{"Data_Plane":false,"Control_Plane":false},"Possible_Solution":"Ensure that all network management and monitoring tools are updated to reflect the new hostname, and communicate the change to relevant stakeholders."}
